t.id, t.product_name, t.product_desc, t.product_type, t.repayment_way, t.sale_start_time, t.sale_end_time, t.is_flow, t.flow_min_rate, t.flow_max_rate, t.add_rate, t.platform_cashback, t.is_fixed_deadline, t.dead_line_min_value, t.dead_line_max_value, t.dead_line_min_self_defined, t.dead_line_max_self_defined, t.is_collect, t.collect_begin_time, t.collect_end_time, t.interest_way, t.valid_begin_date, t.valid_end_date, t.buy_min_money, t.buy_max_money, t.buy_total_money, t.show_index, t.is_have_progress, t.is_redemption, t.redemption_time, t.assignment_time, t.money_type, t.risk_control_type, t.risk_level, t.status, t.creator, t.create_time, t.updater, t.update_time, t.remark, t.product_id, t.org_number, t.third_product_id, t.is_quota, t.buy_increase_money, t.fee_ratio, t.audit_status, t.audit_time, t.detail_open_url, t.if_rookie, t.source_way, t.detail_open_type,

mapper.update:
UPDATE tcim_product
product_name = #{productName},
product_desc = #{productDesc},
product_type = #{productType},
repayment_way = #{repaymentWay},
sale_start_time = #{saleStartTime},
sale_end_time = #{saleEndTime},
is_flow = #{isFlow},
flow_min_rate = #{flowMinRate},
flow_max_rate = #{flowMaxRate},
add_rate = #{addRate},
platform_cashback = #{platformCashback},
is_fixed_deadline = #{isFixedDeadline},
dead_line_min_value = #{deadLineMinValue},
dead_line_max_value = #{deadLineMaxValue},
dead_line_min_self_defined = #{deadLineMinSelfDefined},
dead_line_max_self_defined = #{deadLineMaxSelfDefined},
is_collect = #{isCollect},
collect_begin_time = #{collectBeginTime},
collect_end_time = #{collectEndTime},
interest_way = #{interestWay},
valid_begin_date = #{validBeginDate},
valid_end_date = #{validEndDate},
buy_min_money = #{buyMinMoney},
buy_max_money = #{buyMaxMoney},
buy_total_money = #{buyTotalMoney},
show_index = #{showIndex},
is_have_progress = #{isHaveProgress},
is_redemption = #{isRedemption},
redemption_time = #{redemptionTime},
assignment_time = #{assignmentTime},
money_type = #{moneyType},
risk_control_type = #{riskControlType},
risk_level = #{riskLevel},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
create_time = #{createTime},
updater = #{updater},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark = #{remark},
product_id = #{productId},
org_number = #{orgNumber},
third_product_id = #{thirdProductId},
is_quota = #{isQuota},
buy_increase_money = #{buyIncreaseMoney},
fee_ratio = #{feeRatio},
audit_status = #{auditStatus},
audit_time = #{auditTime},
detail_open_url = #{detailOpenUrl},
if_rookie = #{ifRookie},
source_way = #{sourceWay},
detail_open_type = #{detailOpenType},
id = #{id}

UPDATE tcim_product
product_name = #{productName},
product_desc = #{productDesc},
product_type = #{productType},
repayment_way = #{repaymentWay},
sale_start_time = #{saleStartTime},
sale_end_time = #{saleEndTime},
is_flow = #{isFlow},
flow_min_rate = #{flowMinRate},
flow_max_rate = #{flowMaxRate},
add_rate = #{addRate},
platform_cashback = #{platformCashback},
is_fixed_deadline = #{isFixedDeadline},
dead_line_min_value = #{deadLineMinValue},
dead_line_max_value = #{deadLineMaxValue},
dead_line_min_self_defined = #{deadLineMinSelfDefined},
dead_line_max_self_defined = #{deadLineMaxSelfDefined},
is_collect = #{isCollect},
collect_begin_time = #{collectBeginTime},
collect_end_time = #{collectEndTime},
interest_way = #{interestWay},
valid_begin_date = #{validBeginDate},
valid_end_date = #{validEndDate},
buy_min_money = #{buyMinMoney},
buy_max_money = #{buyMaxMoney},
buy_total_money = #{buyTotalMoney},
show_index = #{showIndex},
is_have_progress = #{isHaveProgress},
is_redemption = #{isRedemption},
redemption_time = #{redemptionTime},
assignment_time = #{assignmentTime},
money_type = #{moneyType},
risk_control_type = #{riskControlType},
risk_level = #{riskLevel},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
create_time = #{createTime},
updater = #{updater},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark = #{remark},
product_id = #{productId},
org_number = #{orgNumber},
third_product_id = #{thirdProductId},
is_quota = #{isQuota},
buy_increase_money = #{buyIncreaseMoney},
fee_ratio = #{feeRatio},
audit_status = #{auditStatus},
audit_time = #{auditTime},
detail_open_url = #{detailOpenUrl},
if_rookie = #{ifRookie},
source_way = #{sourceWay},
detail_open_type = #{detailOpenType},
id = #{0}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tcim_product
name LIKE CONCAT('%','${dt.search.value}','%' )
${item.name} ${item.dir}

SELECT
COUNT(tpr.id) AS cfpRecommend,
temp.*, tc.config_value AS productDetailUrl FROM ( SELECT tp.flow_max_rate AS flowMaxRate, tp.flow_min_rate AS flowMinRate, tp.is_flow AS isFlow, tp.product_id AS productId, tp.product_name AS productName, tp. STATUS AS STATUS, tp.org_number AS orgNumber, tp.third_product_id AS thirdProductId, tp.buy_total_money AS buyTotalMoney, tp.buy_min_money AS buyMinMoney, tp.buy_max_money AS buyMaxMoney, tp.is_quota AS isQuota, tp.fee_ratio AS feeRatio, tp.is_redemption AS isRedemption, tp.redemption_time AS redemptionTime, tp.assignment_time AS assignmentTime, tp.is_fixed_deadline AS isFixedDeadline, tp.dead_line_min_value AS deadLineMinValue, tp.dead_line_max_value AS deadLineMaxValue, tp.dead_line_min_self_defined AS deadLineMinSelfDefined, tp.dead_line_max_self_defined AS deadLineMaxSelfDefined, tp.is_collect AS isCollect, tp.collect_begin_time AS collectBeginTime, tp.collect_end_time AS collectEndTime, tp.add_rate AS addRate, tp.platform_cashback AS platformCashback, tp.is_have_progress AS isHaveProgress, tp.sale_start_time AS saleStartTime, toi.platformlist_ico AS productLogo, toi.org_isstaticproduct AS orgIsstaticproduct, toi.grade AS grade, tps.buyed_total_money AS buyedTotalMoney, tps.buyed_total_people AS buyedTotalPeople, toi.org_fee_type AS orgFeeType, tp.show_index AS showIndex, tp.create_time AS createTime, toi. NAME AS orgName, toi.org_amount_limit AS orgAmountLimit, tpic.sort AS hotSort, 1 AS orderByIndex FROM tcim_product tp, tcim_product_info_cate tpic, tcim_product_cate tpc, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tpic.product_id AND tpic.cate_id = tpc.cate_id AND tpc.cate_name = '热门产品' AND tpc.disabled = 0 AND tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi. STATUS = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp. STATUS = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 UNION SELECT tp.flow_max_rate AS flowMaxRate, tp.flow_min_rate AS flowMinRate, tp.is_flow AS isFlow, tp.product_id AS productId, tp.product_name AS productName, tp. STATUS AS STATUS, tp.org_number AS orgNumber, tp.third_product_id AS thirdProductId, tp.buy_total_money AS buyTotalMoney, tp.buy_min_money AS buyMinMoney, tp.buy_max_money AS buyMaxMoney, tp.is_quota AS isQuota, tp.fee_ratio AS feeRatio, tp.is_redemption AS isRedemption, tp.redemption_time AS redemptionTime, tp.assignment_time AS assignmentTime, tp.is_fixed_deadline AS isFixedDeadline, tp.dead_line_min_value AS deadLineMinValue, tp.dead_line_max_value AS deadLineMaxValue, tp.dead_line_min_self_defined AS deadLineMinSelfDefined, tp.dead_line_max_self_defined AS deadLineMaxSelfDefined, tp.is_collect AS isCollect, tp.collect_begin_time AS collectBeginTime, tp.collect_end_time AS collectEndTime, tp.add_rate AS addRate, tp.platform_cashback AS platformCashback, tp.is_have_progress AS isHaveProgress, tp.sale_start_time AS saleStartTime, toi.platformlist_ico AS productLogo, toi.org_isstaticproduct AS orgIsstaticproduct, toi.grade AS grade, tps.buyed_total_money AS buyedTotalMoney, tps.buyed_total_people AS buyedTotalPeople, toi.org_fee_type AS orgFeeType, tp.show_index AS showIndex, tp.create_time AS createTime, toi. NAME AS orgName, toi.org_amount_limit AS orgAmountLimit, 0 AS hotSort, 0 AS orderByIndex FROM tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.STATUS = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp. STATUS = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 AND tps.buyed_total_money / tp.buy_total_money <= 0.8 ) temp
LEFT JOIN tsys_config tc ON tc.app_type = 1 AND tc.config_type = 'product_config' AND tc.config_key = 'productDetailUrl_channel' LEFT JOIN tcim_product_ref tpr ON tpr.sale_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tpr.product_id = temp.productId
LEFT JOIN tsys_config tc ON tc.app_type = 2 AND tc.config_type = 'product_config' AND tc.config_key = 'productDetailUrl_investor'
where temp.orgNumber = #{orgNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
GROUP BY temp.productId ORDER BY temp.orderByIndex DESC, temp.hotSort DESC, temp.showIndex DESC, temp.createTime DESC

sql.trim:
tp.flow_max_rate AS flowMaxRate, tp.flow_min_rate AS flowMinRate, tp.is_flow AS isFlow, tp.product_id AS productId, tp.product_name AS productName, tp.status AS status, tp.org_number AS orgNumber, tp.third_product_id AS thirdProductId, tp.buy_total_money AS buyTotalMoney, tp.buy_min_money AS buyMinMoney, tp.buy_max_money AS buyMaxMoney, tp.is_quota AS isQuota, tp.fee_ratio AS feeRatio, tp.is_redemption AS isRedemption, tp.redemption_time AS redemptionTime, tp.assignment_time AS assignmentTime, tp.is_fixed_deadline AS isFixedDeadline, tp.dead_line_min_value AS deadLineMinValue, tp.dead_line_max_value AS deadLineMaxValue, tp.dead_line_min_self_defined AS deadLineMinSelfDefined, tp.dead_line_max_self_defined AS deadLineMaxSelfDefined, tp.is_collect AS isCollect, tp.collect_begin_time AS collectBeginTime, tp.collect_end_time AS collectEndTime, tp.add_rate AS addRate, tp.platform_cashback AS platformCashback, tp.is_have_progress AS isHaveProgress, tp.sale_start_time AS saleStartTime, tp.if_rookie AS ifRookie, toi.platformlist_ico AS productLogo, toi.org_isstaticproduct AS orgIsstaticproduct, toi.org_amount_limit AS orgAmountLimit, toi.grade AS grade, toi.org_joint_type AS orgJointType,
( SELECT tc.config_value FROM tsys_config tc WHERE tc.config_type = 'product_config' AND tc.config_key = 'productDetailUrl_investor' AND tc.app_type = 2 ) AS productDetailUrl,
( SELECT tc.config_value FROM tsys_config tc WHERE tc.config_type = 'product_config' AND tc.config_key = 'productDetailUrl_channel' AND tc.app_type = 1 ) AS productDetailUrl,
( SELECT tc.config_value FROM tsys_config tc WHERE tc.config_type = 'JFQZ' AND tc.config_key = 'jfqzProductDetailUrl' ) AS jfqzProductDetailUrl, tps.buyed_total_money AS buyedTotalMoney, tps.buyed_total_people AS buyedTotalPeople, toi.org_fee_type AS orgFeeType, toi.name AS orgName, case when tp.sale_start_time < NOW() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isSalling

mapper.select:
SELECT
( SELECT count(*) FROM tcim_product_ref tpr WHERE tpr.sale_user_id = tc.user_id AND tpr.product_id = tp.product_id ) AS cfpRecommend,
FROM
tcrm_cfplanner tc,
tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1
AND tc.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND toi.org_number = #{orgNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY isSalling DESC
,tp.show_index
,tp.flow_min_rate
,tp.flow_max_rate
,tp.dead_line_min_value
,tp.dead_line_max_value
,tp.fee_ratio
ASC
DESC
,tp.create_time DESC

SELECT
( SELECT count(*) FROM tcim_product_ref tpr WHERE tpr.sale_user_id = tc.user_id AND tpr.product_id = tp.product_id ) AS cfpRecommend,
FROM
tcrm_cfplanner tc,
tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_product_info_cate tpic, tcim_product_cate tpc, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tpic.product_id AND tpic.cate_id = tpc.cate_id
AND tpc.cate_id = #{cateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND tpc.disabled = 0 AND tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1
AND tc.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND toi.org_number = #{orgNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY isSalling DESC
,tpic.sort DESC,
tp.show_index
tp.flow_min_rate
tp.flow_max_rate
tp.dead_line_min_value
tp.dead_line_max_value
tp.fee_ratio
ASC
DESC
,tp.create_time DESC

SELECT
( SELECT count(*) FROM tcim_product_ref tpr WHERE tpr.sale_user_id = tc.user_id AND tpr.product_id = tp.product_id ) AS cfpRecommend,
FROM
tcrm_cfplanner tc,
tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1
AND toi.org_fee_type = 1
AND toi.org_fee_type = 2
AND tc.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND toi.org_number = #{orgNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY isSalling DESC
,tp.show_index
,tp.flow_min_rate
,tp.flow_max_rate
,tp.dead_line_min_value
,tp.dead_line_max_value
,tp.fee_ratio
ASC
DESC
,tp.create_time DESC

SELECT
FROM tcim_product_ref tpr, tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 AND tp.product_id = tpr.product_id AND tpr.investor_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tpr.sale_user_id = #{cfplannerUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND toi.org_number = #{orgNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY
tp.show_index
tp.flow_min_rate
tp.flow_max_rate
tp.dead_line_min_value
tp.dead_line_max_value
tp.fee_ratio
ASC
DESC
,tp.create_time DESC

SELECT tpc.cate_id AS cateId, tpc.description AS cateName, tpc.cate_logo_investor AS cateLogoInvestor, tpc.cate_logo_channel AS cateLogoChannel, tpc.url_link AS urlLink, tpc.cate_declare AS cateDeclare, count(tp.product_id) AS count, IFNULL(MIN(tp.flow_min_rate), 0) AS flowMinRateStatistics, IFNULL(MAX(tp.flow_max_rate), 0) AS flowMaxRateStatistics FROM tcim_product_cate tpc LEFT JOIN tcim_product_info_cate tpic ON tpic.cate_id = tpc.cate_id LEFT JOIN tcim_product tp ON tp.product_id = tpic.product_id AND tp. STATUS = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 LEFT JOIN tcim_product_statistics tps ON tp.product_id = tps.product_id LEFT JOIN tcim_org_info toi ON toi.org_number = tp.org_number WHERE tpc.disabled = 0 AND toi. STATUS = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tpc.cate_id IN (${cateIdList}) GROUP BY tpc.cate_id ORDER BY tpc.order_num ASC

SELECT
901 AS cateId, "首投标" AS cateName, ( SELECT tc.config_value FROM tsys_config tc WHERE tc.config_type = 'product_extendsCate_config' AND tc.config_key = 'productCate_Logo_901' AND tc.app_type = 1 ) AS cateLogoChannel, ( SELECT tc.config_value FROM tsys_config tc WHERE tc.config_type = 'product_extendsCate_config' AND tc.config_key = 'productUrl_Link_901' AND tc.app_type = 1 ) AS urlLink,
902 AS cateId, "复投标" AS cateName, ( SELECT tc.config_value FROM tsys_config tc WHERE tc.config_type = 'product_extendsCate_config' AND tc.config_key = 'productCate_Logo_902' AND tc.app_type = 1 ) AS cateLogoChannel, ( SELECT tc.config_value FROM tsys_config tc WHERE tc.config_type = 'product_extendsCate_config' AND tc.config_key = 'productUrl_Link_902' AND tc.app_type = 1 ) AS urlLink,
count(*) AS count, MIN(tp.flow_min_rate) AS flowMinRateStatistics, MAX(tp.flow_max_rate) AS flowMaxRateStatistics FROM tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1
AND toi.org_fee_type = 1
AND toi.org_fee_type = 2

SELECT t.is_flow isFlow, t.flow_min_rate feeRateMin, t.flow_max_rate feeRateMax, t.product_id proId, t.product_name proName, t.buy_total_money totalMoney, IFNULL(SUM(t1.invest_amt), 0) investmentAmount FROM tcim_product t LEFT JOIN tcim_product_invest_record t1 ON t.product_id = t1.product_id WHERE t.org_number = #{orgNumber} AND t.status=1 GROUP BY t.product_id

select , tps.buyed_total_money AS buyedTotalMoney, tps.buyed_total_people AS buyedTotalPeople, ( SELECT tc.config_value FROM tsys_config tc WHERE tc.config_type = 'JFQZ' AND tc.config_key = 'jfqzProductDetailUrl' ) AS jfqzProductDetailUrl FROM tcim_product t, tcim_product_statistics tps WHERE t.product_id =#{productId} AND t.product_id = tps.product_id

SELECT tpc.description FROM tcim_product_cate tpc, tcim_product_info_cate tpic WHERE tpc.cate_id = tpic.cate_id AND tpc.disabled = '0' AND tpc.if_show = 0
AND tpc.ispublic in (0,2)
AND tpc.ispublic in (0,1)
AND tpic.product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select , tps.buyed_total_money AS buyedTotalMoney, tps.buyed_total_people AS buyedTotalPeople FROM tcim_product t, tcim_product_statistics tps WHERE t.product_id =#{productId} AND t.product_id = tps.product_id

UPDATE tcim_product tp SET
tp.audit_status = 1,
tp.audit_status = 3,
tp.audit_time = NOW() WHERE
tp.id in (${productTableIdList})
tp.audit_status = 2

SELECT tui.user_name AS user, tui.mobile AS mobile, tpir.invest_amt AS amt, tpir.start_time AS time FROM tcim_product_invest_record tpir LEFT JOIN tcrm_user_info tui ON tpir.user_id = tui.user_id WHERE tpir.product_id = #{productId} order by tpir.start_time desc

SELECT p.org_number, p.product_name, p.product_name, p.product_type, p.dead_line_min_value, p.product_id, p.fee_ratio, p.is_collect, p.sale_start_time, p.sale_end_time, p.product_id, p.dead_line_max_value, p.is_redemption, p.`status`, COUNT(i.invest_id) investCount FROM tcim_product p LEFT JOIN tcim_org_info o ON p.org_number = o.org_number LEFT JOIN tcim_product_invest_record i ON i.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.is_redemption IN (1, 2, 3) AND o.org_fee_type = 2 AND o.org_isstaticproduct=0 AND ((p.is_collect=1 ) or (p.is_collect=2 AND p.`status` = 2)) GROUP BY p.product_id HAVING investCount > 0

SELECT
( SELECT count(*) FROM tcim_product_ref tpr WHERE tpr.sale_user_id = tc.user_id AND tpr.product_id = tp.product_id ) AS cfpRecommend,
FROM
tcrm_cfplanner tc,
tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND tp.sale_start_time <= now() AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1
AND tc.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND toi.org_number = #{orgNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ( (tp.dead_line_min_value <= #{minDeadLine} AND tp.dead_line_max_value >= #{maxDeadLine}) OR (tp.dead_line_min_value >= #{minDeadLine} AND tp.dead_line_min_value <= #{maxDeadLine}) OR (tp.dead_line_max_value >= #{minDeadLine} AND tp.dead_line_max_value <= #{maxDeadLine}) )
AND ( ((tp.flow_min_rate+IFNULL(tp.add_rate,0)+IFNULL(tp.platform_cashback,0)) <= #{minYearProfit} AND (tp.flow_max_rate+IFNULL(tp.add_rate,0)+IFNULL(tp.platform_cashback,0)) >= #{maxYearProfit}) OR ((tp.flow_min_rate+IFNULL(tp.add_rate,0)+IFNULL(tp.platform_cashback,0)) >= #{minYearProfit} AND (tp.flow_min_rate+IFNULL(tp.add_rate,0)+IFNULL(tp.platform_cashback,0)) <= #{maxYearProfit}) OR ((tp.flow_max_rate+IFNULL(tp.add_rate,0)+IFNULL(tp.platform_cashback,0)) >= #{minYearProfit} AND (tp.flow_max_rate+IFNULL(tp.add_rate,0)+IFNULL(tp.platform_cashback,0)) <= #{maxYearProfit}) )
AND tp.org_number in (select org_number from tcim_org_info where context = #{platformContext})
and toi.grade ${securityLevel}
ORDER BY
tp.show_index
tp.flow_min_rate
tp.flow_max_rate
tp.dead_line_min_value
tp.dead_line_max_value
tp.fee_ratio
ASC
DESC
,tp.create_time DESC

SELECT tp.flow_max_rate AS flowMaxRate, tp.flow_min_rate AS flowMinRate, tp.is_flow AS isFlow, tp.product_id AS productId, tp.product_name AS productName, tp.fee_ratio AS feeRatio, tp.is_fixed_deadline AS isFixedDeadline, tp.dead_line_min_value AS deadLineMinValue, tp.dead_line_max_value AS deadLineMaxValue, tp.dead_line_min_self_defined AS deadLineMinSelfDefined, tp.dead_line_max_self_defined AS deadLineMaxSelfDefined FROM tcim_product tp WHERE tp.product_id
#{pid}

SELECT
( SELECT count(*) FROM tcim_product_ref tpr WHERE tpr.sale_user_id = tc.user_id AND tpr.product_id = tp.product_id ) AS cfpRecommend,
COUNT(*) recommendTimes,
FROM
tcrm_cfplanner tc,
tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi, tcim_product_ref tpr WHERE
tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND tpr.product_id = tp.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND tc.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND toi.org_isstaticproduct = 0 AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(tpr.recommend_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 2 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY tpr.product_id ORDER BY recommendTimes DESC

SELECT
( SELECT count(*) FROM tcim_product_ref tpr WHERE tpr.sale_user_id = tc.user_id AND tpr.product_id = tp.product_id ) AS cfpRecommend,
FROM
tcrm_cfplanner tc,
tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_product_info_cate tpic, tcim_product_cate tpc, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tpic.product_id
AND tc.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND tpic.cate_id = tpc.cate_id AND tpc.cate_id = 2 AND tpc.disabled = 0 AND tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 AND toi.org_number in (SELECT toi.org_number FROM tcim_org_info toi LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tcim_product_invest_record WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) tpir ON tpir.platfrom = toi.org_number WHERE tpir.invest_id IS NULL) order by isSalling DESC,(tp.flow_max_rate+IFNULL(tp.add_rate,0)+IFNULL(tp.platform_cashback,0)) desc limit 1

SELECT
FROM tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_product_info_cate tpic, tcim_product_cate tpc, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tpic.product_id AND tpic.cate_id = tpc.cate_id
AND tpc.cate_id = #{cateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND tpc.disabled = 0 AND tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1
AND toi.org_number = #{orgNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY isSalling DESC
,tp.dead_line_min_value asc
,(tp.flow_max_rate+IFNULL(tp.add_rate,0)+IFNULL(tp.platform_cashback,0)) desc
,tp.dead_line_min_value asc, (tp.flow_max_rate+IFNULL(tp.add_rate,0)+IFNULL(tp.platform_cashback,0)) desc
limit 1

SELECT
( SELECT count(*) FROM tcim_product_ref tpr WHERE tpr.sale_user_id = tc.user_id AND tpr.product_id = tp.product_id ) AS cfpRecommend,
COUNT(*) recommendTimes,
FROM
tcrm_cfplanner tc,
tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi, tcim_product_ref tpr WHERE
tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND tpr.product_id = tp.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND tc.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND toi.org_isstaticproduct = 0 AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(tpr.recommend_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 2 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY tpr.product_id ORDER BY recommendTimes DESC limit 10

SELECT
( SELECT count(*) FROM tcim_product_ref tpr WHERE tpr.sale_user_id = tc.user_id AND tpr.product_id = tp.product_id ) AS cfpRecommend,
(tp.buy_total_money - tps.buyed_total_money) AS reTotalMoney ,
FROM
tcrm_cfplanner tc,
tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND tc.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND toi.org_isstaticproduct = 0 AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 GROUP BY tp.product_id ORDER BY reTotalMoney ASC limit #{limitSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT
FROM tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1
AND tp.if_rookie = #{ifRookie,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND toi.org_number = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (tp.flow_min_rate <= 8 OR tp.flow_max_rate <= 8 )
AND ( ( tp.flow_min_rate >= 8 AND tp.flow_min_rate <= 12 ) OR ( tp.flow_max_rate >= 8 AND tp.flow_max_rate <= 12 ) )
AND (tp.flow_min_rate >= 12 OR tp.flow_max_rate >= 12 )
AND (tp.dead_line_min_value <= 31 OR tp.dead_line_max_value <= 31 )
AND ( ( tp.dead_line_min_value >= 28 AND tp.dead_line_min_value <= 93 ) OR ( tp.dead_line_max_value >= 28 AND tp.dead_line_max_value <= 93 ) )
AND ( ( tp.dead_line_min_value >= 89 AND tp.dead_line_min_value <= 183 ) OR ( tp.dead_line_max_value >= 89 AND tp.dead_line_max_value <= 183 ) )
AND ( ( tp.dead_line_min_value >= 178 AND tp.dead_line_min_value <= 366 ) OR ( tp.dead_line_max_value >= 178 AND tp.dead_line_max_value <= 366 ) )
AND (tp.dead_line_min_value >= 360 OR tp.dead_line_max_value >= 360 )
ORDER BY isSalling DESC
,tp.if_rookie ASC
,tp.flow_min_rate ASC
,tp.flow_min_rate DESC,tp.flow_max_rate DESC
,tp.dead_line_min_value ASC
,tp.dead_line_max_value DESC
,tp.create_time DESC

SELECT count(tp.id) FROM tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1
AND tp.if_rookie = #{ifRookie,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND toi.org_number = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (tp.flow_min_rate <= 8 OR tp.flow_max_rate <= 8 )
AND ( ( tp.flow_min_rate >= 8 AND tp.flow_min_rate <= 12 ) OR ( tp.flow_max_rate >= 8 AND tp.flow_max_rate <= 12 ) )
AND (tp.flow_min_rate >= 12 OR tp.flow_max_rate >= 12 )
AND (tp.dead_line_min_value <= 31 OR tp.dead_line_max_value <= 31 )
AND ( ( tp.dead_line_min_value >= 28 AND tp.dead_line_min_value <= 93 ) OR ( tp.dead_line_max_value >= 28 AND tp.dead_line_max_value <= 93 ) )
AND ( ( tp.dead_line_min_value >= 89 AND tp.dead_line_min_value <= 183 ) OR ( tp.dead_line_max_value >= 89 AND tp.dead_line_max_value <= 183 ) )
AND ( ( tp.dead_line_min_value >= 178 AND tp.dead_line_min_value <= 366 ) OR ( tp.dead_line_max_value >= 178 AND tp.dead_line_max_value <= 366 ) )
AND (tp.dead_line_min_value >= 360 OR tp.dead_line_max_value >= 360 )

SELECT
FROM tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 AND tp.product_id in( SELECT temp2.product_id FROM (SELECT temp.product_id FROM ( SELECT tp2.product_id, tp2.org_number, toi2.homepage_sort, case when tp2.sale_start_time < NOW() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isSalling FROM tcim_product tp2, tcim_product_statistics tps2, tcim_org_info toi2 WHERE tp2.product_id = tps2.product_id AND toi2.org_number = tp2.org_number AND toi2.status = 1
AND toi2.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp2.buy_total_money > tps2.buyed_total_money AND tp2.status = 1 AND tp2.audit_status = 1 AND toi2.recommend = 1 ORDER BY isSalling DESC, tp2.flow_min_rate DESC ) AS temp GROUP BY temp.org_number ORDER BY temp.homepage_sort ASC
LIMIT #{limitNumber}
) temp2 )

SELECT * FROM ((SELECT , toi.homepage_sort as homepageSort, tp.audit_time as auditTime FROM tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1 AND toi.recommend = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND tp.status = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1
AND tp.dead_line_min_value BETWEEN 28 AND 188
AND tp.dead_line_min_value BETWEEN 189 AND 368
AND tp.flow_min_rate >= 9 AND if_rookie = 2) UNION (SELECT , toi.homepage_sort as homepageSort, tp.audit_time as auditTime FROM tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND toi.org_number = tp.org_number AND toi.status = 1 AND toi.recommend = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.status = 2 AND tp.buy_total_money = tps.buyed_total_money AND DATE_FORMAT(tp.sale_end_time,"%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d") AND tp.audit_status = 1
AND tp.dead_line_min_value BETWEEN 28 AND 188
AND tp.dead_line_min_value BETWEEN 189 AND 368
AND tp.flow_min_rate >= 9 AND if_rookie = 2 )) temp ORDER BY temp.status ASC, temp.homepageSort ASC, temp.flowMinRate DESC, temp.deadLineMinValue ASC, temp.auditTime DESC
${queryProductSql}

SELECT 1 AS cateId, IFNULL(MIN(tp.flow_min_rate), 0) AS flowMinRateStatistics, IFNULL(MAX(tp.flow_max_rate), 0) AS flowMaxRateStatistics FROM tcim_product tp LEFT JOIN tcim_org_info toi ON toi.org_number = tp.org_number LEFT JOIN tcim_product_statistics tps ON tp.product_id = tps.product_id WHERE tp. STATUS = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 AND toi. STATUS = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND ( ( tp.is_fixed_deadline = 1 AND dead_line_min_value <= 105 ) OR ( tp.is_fixed_deadline = 2 AND dead_line_min_value <= 105 ) ) UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS cateId, IFNULL(MIN(tp.flow_min_rate), 0) AS flowMinRateStatistics, IFNULL(MAX(tp.flow_max_rate), 0) AS flowMaxRateStatistics FROM tcim_product tp LEFT JOIN tcim_org_info toi ON toi.org_number = tp.org_number LEFT JOIN tcim_product_statistics tps ON tp.product_id = tps.product_id WHERE tp. STATUS = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 AND toi. STATUS = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND ( ( tp.is_fixed_deadline = 1 AND dead_line_min_value BETWEEN 105 AND 195 ) OR ( tp.is_fixed_deadline = 2 AND dead_line_min_value BETWEEN 105 AND 195 ) ) UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS cateId, IFNULL(MIN(tp.flow_min_rate), 0) AS flowMinRateStatistics, IFNULL(MAX(tp.flow_max_rate), 0) AS flowMaxRateStatistics FROM tcim_product tp LEFT JOIN tcim_org_info toi ON toi.org_number = tp.org_number LEFT JOIN tcim_product_statistics tps ON tp.product_id = tps.product_id WHERE tp. STATUS = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 AND toi. STATUS = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money AND ( ( tp.is_fixed_deadline = 1 AND dead_line_min_value > 195 ) OR ( tp.is_fixed_deadline = 2 AND dead_line_min_value > 195 ) )

SELECT tp.product_id AS productId, tp.product_name AS productName, tp.buy_total_money AS buyTotalMoney, tp.flow_max_rate AS flowMaxRate, tp.flow_min_rate AS flowMinRate, tp.buy_min_money AS buyMinMoney, tp.buy_max_money AS buyMaxMoney, tp.org_number AS orgNumber, tp.fee_ratio AS feeRatio, tp.is_flow AS isFlow, tp.if_rookie AS ifRookie, tp.is_fixed_deadline AS isFixedDeadline, tp.dead_line_min_value AS deadLineMinValue, tp.dead_line_max_value AS deadLineMaxValue, tp.dead_line_min_self_defined AS deadLineMinSelfDefined, tp.dead_line_max_self_defined AS deadLineMaxSelfDefined, toi.platformlist_ico AS productLogo, toi.grade AS grade, tps.buyed_total_money AS buyedTotalMoney,
( SELECT tc.config_value FROM tsys_config tc WHERE tc.config_type = 'product_config' AND tc.config_key = 'productDetailUrl_investor' AND tc.app_type = 2 ) AS productDetailUrl,
( SELECT tc.config_value FROM tsys_config tc WHERE tc.config_type = 'product_config' AND tc.config_key = 'productDetailUrl_channel' AND tc.app_type = 1 ) AS productDetailUrl,
( SELECT tc.config_value FROM tsys_config tc WHERE tc.config_type = 'JFQZ' AND tc.config_key = 'jfqzProductDetailUrl' ) AS jfqzProductDetailUrl, case when tp.sale_start_time < NOW() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isSalling FROM tcim_product tp LEFT JOIN tcim_org_info toi ON toi.org_number = tp.org_number LEFT JOIN tcim_product_statistics tps ON tp.product_id = tps.product_id WHERE tp. STATUS = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 AND toi. STATUS = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money
AND ((tp.is_fixed_deadline = 1 AND dead_line_min_value <= 105) OR ( tp.is_fixed_deadline = 2 AND dead_line_min_value <= 105 ) )
AND ((tp.is_fixed_deadline = 1 AND dead_line_min_value BETWEEN 105 AND 195 ) OR ( tp.is_fixed_deadline = 2 AND dead_line_min_value BETWEEN 105 AND 195 ) )
AND ((tp.is_fixed_deadline = 1 AND dead_line_min_value > 195 ) OR ( tp.is_fixed_deadline = 2 AND dead_line_min_value > 195 ) )
ORDER BY isSalling DESC
,tp.flow_min_rate ASC
,tp.flow_min_rate DESC,tp.flow_max_rate DESC
,tp.dead_line_min_value ASC
,tp.dead_line_max_value DESC
,tp.create_time DESC
